about_the_game:
Autotiles made easy

  • Set autotiles by just doing a couple of clicks with a powerful tile profile editor. Also the tile settings can be shared to use the most popular tiles distributions.

Set tile animations

  • Animating the tiles never have been that easy, set an animation and assign it to any of your tiles and it would work. Including whole groups of autotiles :D. Watch the results in the editor!

Collisions and special objects

  • Set as many types of collisions you want and assign them to specific tiles or autotiles. You can also override the assigned collisions too! Also place special objects locations very easy in the map!

Export to multiple platforms

  • Get your maps working on your favourites engine by making a couple of clicks. Right now Game Maker, Love2D and Unity3D is supported. The tool has an export scripter that allow anyone to build its own exporters and I will add more support soon!

More cool features

  • Modify images inside the tool like removing backgrounds or merging images
  • Autodetect splitted tiles
  • Move the tiles to different positions to organize them as you like
  • Manage multiple maps
detailed_description:
Autotiles made easy

  • Set autotiles by just doing a couple of clicks with a powerful tile profile editor. Also the tile settings can be shared to use the most popular tiles distributions.

Set tile animations

  • Animating the tiles never have been that easy, set an animation and assign it to any of your tiles and it would work. Including whole groups of autotiles :D. Watch the results in the editor!

Collisions and special objects

  • Set as many types of collisions you want and assign them to specific tiles or autotiles. You can also override the assigned collisions too! Also place special objects locations very easy in the map!

Export to multiple platforms

  • Get your maps working on your favourites engine by making a couple of clicks. Right now Game Maker, Love2D and Unity3D is supported. The tool has an export scripter that allow anyone to build its own exporters and I will add more support soon!

More cool features

  • Modify images inside the tool like removing backgrounds or merging images
  • Autodetect splitted tiles
  • Move the tiles to different positions to organize them as you like
  • Manage multiple maps

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: Easy Tile Mapper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7
  • Processor: PC with 800MHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: A really easy tile map tool that exports to your favourite game development engines!
